# numberOfItems

**Instance Property**

The total number of items in the pop-up list.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfItems: Int { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **numberOfVisibleItems**: The maximum number of visible items to display in the pop-up list at one time.

## Configuring the Combo Box Items

- **addItems(withObjectValues:)**: Adds multiple objects to the end of the receiver’s internal item list.
- **addItem(withObjectValue:)**: Adds an object to the end of the receiver’s internal item list.
- **insertItem(withObjectValue:at:)**: Inserts an object at the specified location in the receiver’s internal item list.
- **objectValues**: An array of the items from the combo box’s internal list.
- **removeAllItems()**: Removes all items from the receiver’s internal item list.
- **removeItem(at:)**: Removes the object at the specified location from the receiver’s internal item list.
- **removeItem(withObjectValue:)**: Removes all occurrences of the given object from the receiver’s internal item list.
